TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutoToolTipPlacement extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the means by which the automatic is positioned on a control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> using the values of this enumeration.
[!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement BottomRight = int32(2)

Docs.summary: For a horizontal show the automatic at the bottom edge of the . For a vertical show the automatic at the right edge of the .
